item.title: Midday Gains in Major U.S. Stock Indexes Expand, with SBET Soaring 15%
item.description: On August 4th, according to data from rockflow (https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats), the three major U.S. stock indexes witnessed an expanded increase during intraday trading. The Nasdaq rose by more than 1.6%, the S&P 500 rose by nearly 1.2%, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose by nearly 1%. Crypto stocks, which initially had mixed performances at the opening, turned into a general upward trend, including:Coinbase (COIN) increased by 1.83%.Circle (CRCL) decreased by 5.12%.MicroStrategy (MSTR) increased by 4.34%.MARA Holdings (MARA) increased by 1.57%.Riot Blockchain (RIOT) increased by 3.34%.BTCS (BTCS) increased by 2.83%.Bit Digital (BTBT) increased by 5.31%.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) increased by 15.17%.CEA Industries (VAPE) increased by 10.73%.GameSquare (GAME) increased by 12.85%.

item.title: 「Insider Trader」 @qwatio Closes XRP, SOL Shorts, Turns $12 Million Unrealized Gain into Loss
item.description: August 4th. As per on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), the "Insider Trader" @qwatio closed XRP and SOL short positions half an hour ago, incurring a total loss of $1.644 million. Yesterday, there was a realized gain of $12 million.Currently, there still remains a value of $105 million in BTC and ETH short positions. BTC is in a realized gain state as the entry price is $116,736.3, while ETH is already in a realized loss of $1.094 million.

item.title: pump.fun Test Website to Introduce "Reward" Functionality, Transaction Volume Incentive Program Coming Soon
item.description: August 4th - As per market sources, the "Reward" feature of the pump.fun test website, which is a transaction volume incentive plan, is about to become operational.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $115,000
item.description: On August 4th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin has shown a rebound and exceeded $115,000. It is currently trading at $115,218.

item.title: Sharplink Gaming Increases Holdings by 18,600 ETH, Bringing Total Holdings to Nearly 500,000 ETH
item.description: On August 4th, based on on-chain analysis, Sharplink Gaming (SBET) has increased its strategic ETH reserve address by an additional 18,680 ETH, which is valued at $66.3 million. Currently, it holds 498,884 ETH with a value of $1.8 billion.

item.title: US stock GameSquare (GAME) surges over 13%, announced today to increase its ETH holdings by 2717 coins
item.description: On August 4th, according to data from rockflow (https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats), the stock price of GameSquare (GAME) in the US stock market increased by 13.15% and is currently trading at $0.9175.Previously, BlockBeats reported that GameSquare announced today the approval of a stock buyback program funded by Ethereum earnings. It spent $10 million to purchase an additional 2,717 ETH, increasing the treasury holdings to 15,630.07 ETH.

item.title: S&P 500 gains expand to 1%, Nasdaq gains expand to 1.5%
item.description: On August 4th, based on the data from rockflow, the S&P 500 Index increased its gain to 1%, and the Nasdaq 100 Index rose by 1.5%.

item.title: An institution's address bought 14,000 ETH via OSL, equivalent to approximately $50 million.
item.description: On August 4th, as monitored by on-chain data analyst Yujin, a certain institutional address has just made a purchase of $50 million worth of ETH through OSL. The address withdrew 50 million USDT from Bitget 7 hours ago and transferred it to OSL. Subsequently, 15 minutes ago, it received 14,006 ETH at a purchase price of approximately $3,570.

item.title: Sky spent $1.39 million last week to buy back 16.55 million SKY tokens
item.description: On August 4th, according to official channels, Sky (formerly known as MakerDAO) spent $1.39 million during the previous week to repurchase 16.55 million SKY. Currently, the cumulative amount of SKY repurchased amounts to 1.11 billion, accounting for approximately 3.28% of the total supply.

item.title: VERB's trading volume reached 6.8 million shares after the "Raising $558 Million to Establish TON Treasury" announcement, approximately 9 times the circulating supply.
item.description: On August 4th, according to Farside Investors. Within 5 minutes after the announcement that "Verb Technology has completed a $558 million private placement to initiate its TON reserve strategy", the trading volume of VERB reached 6.8 million shares, which is approximately 9 times the circulating supply.
